revised_title: Anniversary Dinner 1975: Reflections on Science, Cooperation, and Independence
tldr: The anniversary dinner of the Royal Society in 1975 featured speeches by prominent scientists and academics, discussing the history and role of the Royal Society, the importance of international scientific cooperation, and the relationship between science and politics. The European Science Foundation was also highlighted as a significant development in European scientific collaboration.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
